title: Kanye West feels like he’s been with Kim Kardashian for 100 years
text:
The two have been married since 2014 (Picture: James Devaney/GC Images)

Kanye West revealed it feels like he’s been married to Kim Kardashian for ‘100 years’ and we are in awe at their adorable relationship.

The Everything We Need rapper appeared on a bougie version of Carpool Karaoke, only this time it was called Airpool Karaoke.

How else were they going to fit the entire choir?

Speaking to host of The Late Late Show James Corden, the 42-year-old said: ‘Marriage years are different than human years. Like you know how dog years are like seven years? Every marriage year is like 100 years.’

The couple got married in May 2014 and recently renewed their vows for their fifth wedding anniversary shortly after the birth of their fourth child Psalm.

Kim threw the vow renewal with their family in attendance, and even wore a white dress for the occasion.

Read more: https://metro.co.uk/2019/10/21/kim-kardashian-kanye-west-renew-vows-fifth-wedding-anniversary-10953989/?ito=cbshare

Advertisement

Advertisement

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MetroUK | Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MetroUK/

Kanye also opened up about his faith after performing with his Sunday Service choir during the show.

‘People in my family were praying for me, but they couldn’t call me and scream at me,’ the father-of-four said.

‘But it was God that came and put this thing on my heart and asked if I was ready to be in service to him… I have no regret and no shame.’

The host and Kanye were flying high with their gospel-singing (Picture: NIPI/CBS/BACKGRID)

Kanye’s ready for a nap (Picture: CBS / BACKGRID)

The Gold Digger rapper recently released his gospel album Jesus Is King after a month of delays and speculations.

He recently revealed he is heading out on the road as soon as possible – in between his bid for Presidency, that is.

When asked if he would be touring the album, he told TMZ: ‘Right away.’ Kanye last toured in 2016 to promote the album The Life of Pablo.

Discussing his spiritual journey at a listening party in Washington, D. C. earlier this month, he told a crowd: ‘I want to let you know that I am not here for your entertainment this afternoon.

‘We are here to spread the gospel.’

Kanye’s religion also meant he finally got to deal with his porn addiction.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘For me, Playboy was my gateway into full-on pornography addiction,’ he told Zane Lowe. ‘My dad had a Playboy left out at age five and it’s affected almost every choice I made for the rest of my life.’

‘I think when people have been addicted to something like, if you ask somebody that’s a drug addict it’s like you say, “Are you still addicted?”,’ he explained.

‘Well yeah, you turn it off actually. It’s like, with God I’ve been able to beat things that had a full control of me.’

description: Kanye West appeared on The Late Late Show with James Corden to talk about his marriage to Kim Kardashian and his new gospel album.
